column1: Topic title: I think Pakatan Harapan new logo options are nice

column8: text
Looks good. Simple. Matured and well designed. I opt for option C. Best one out of the bunchWhat u guys think

what does it represents?and it bothers me, why they did something that need to be change after achieve target (win the election)..like previous song Berubah...and then this Harapan...

Now that I think about it, prolly bad idea.Most of the typical imagery people associate with hope/harapan doesn't work well in Malaysia lol.Holding hands, might get huge backlash from muslims.Dove, too christian.Putting hands together/cradling something, too christian.So you end up with a thumbs up lol.
Like supermarket pasaraya logo

Was just thinking about that lol, I wonder if it's sacrilege to use elements of the malaysian flag as part of a logo.Could do the malaysian flag's sun rising from the red and white stripes similar to how obama's logo was done.
